DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness Talent Endoluminal Spring Graft System , investigational device , treat abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) . The treatment population include patient abdominal aortic aneurysm meet inclusion/exclusion criterion . All patient treatment population undergo post-procedure follow-up evaluation one ( 1 ) , six ( 6 ) , 12 month annually thereafter five ( 5 ) year post-procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Physician-Sponsored IDE Talent Endoluminal Spring Graft System Patients With Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms ( AAA )
DOC.detailed_description: Endovascular aneurysm repair ( EVAR ) offer certain advantage compare surgical repair abdominal aortic aneurysm . Known benefit associate EVAR , describe scientific literature , include minimally invasive procedure , short ICU hospital stay , reduce blood loss , rapid recovery , reduce need general anesthesia . Potential benefit may associate use Talent device include reduce occurrence endoleaks , therefore reduced subsequent re-interventions . The risks/complications know occur patient undergo AAA repair may include anesthetic complication , ( e.g. , aspiration ) , aneurysm enlargement , rupture , perforation dissection , bleeding , arterial venous thrombosis and/or pseudoaneurysm , arteriovenous fistula , hematoma coagulopathy , bowel complication , cardiac complication , ( e.g. , arrhythmia , myocardial infarction , congestive heart failure , hypotension , hypertension ) , embolization ( micro macro ) transient permanent ischemia infarction , genitourinary complication , infection , neurologic complication , occlusion device native vessel , pulmonary/respiratory complication renal complication .
DOC.criteria: Subjects participate study must fulfill follow criterion . Subject > 18 year age . Subject pregnant , , female childbearing potential , practice contraception . Subject document evidence least one patent internal iliac artery . Subject AAA dilate > 4 cm diameter . Subject proximal AAA neck ( distance top aneurysm renal artery ) > 5 mm . Subject proximal aortic neck diameter > 14 mm < 32 mm . Subject angle suprarenal aorta aneurysm < 60o . Subject renal artery > 9 cm aortic bifurcation . Subject proximal distal iliac neck diameter > 8 mm < 18 mm accommodate stock device . For subject whose proximal distal iliac diameter > 18 mm , custom device variation fixation diameter order manufacturer . Subject distal iliac neck length > 15 mm . Subject sign informed consent . Subject available followup 12 month procedure . Subjects fulfill follow criterion may participate study . Subject patent internal iliac artery require graft extension external iliac artery . Subject one patent subrenal artery potential retrograde flow stentgrafting . Subject dominant patent inferior mesenteric artery occlude stenotic celiac superior mesenteric artery . Subject aneurysm involve internal iliac artery . Subject lesion cross guide wire . Subject whose arterial access site accommodate delivery catheter . Subject distal vascular bed . Subject systemic infection , suspect systemic infection . Subject contraindication use contrast medium anticoagulation drug . Subject receive previous stent subrenal aorta . Subject untreatable bleeding diathesis . Subject hypercoagulable state .
